meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Alzheimer's Care Assessed Patients with advanced Alzheimer's disease who suffer broken hips or pneumonia often receive treatment that involves too many painful medical procedures and too little pain relief, a study has found.

Alzheimer's Care Assessed Patients with advanced Alzheimer's disease who suffer broken hips or pneumonia often receive treatment that involves too many painful medical procedures and too little pain relief, a study has found.

Two Sides of Gore Law enforcement officials said they saw two very different Al Gores in an April interview, one who was a stickler for details and another who offered vague responses to questions on campaign finances.

In Tennis, Sister vs. Sister Venus Williams defeated top-ranked Martina Hingis at Wimbledon to set up a semifinal matchup against her sister, Serena. Lindsay Davenport, the defending champion, also advanced.
